00071 namespace SystemsBiologyWorkbench

00073 
00075 struct sbwSignatureType : public SBWObject
00076 {
00077 public:
00082         virtual DataBlockType getType() = 0 ;
00083 
00091         virtual std::vector<SignatureElement> *getContents() { throw new SBWTypeMismatchException("this type is not a list");}
00092 
00099         virtual sbwSignatureType *getArrayInnerType() { throw new SBWTypeMismatchException("this type is not an array"); }
00100 
00107         virtual Integer getArrayDimensions() { throw new SBWTypeMismatchException("this type is not an array"); }
00108 
00113         virtual bool isList() { return false; }
00114 
00115         // Note the functions involving va_list below are specific to the C interface
00116         // the use of these functions in C++ is not recommended
00117 
00124         virtual void write(DataBlockWriter writer, va_list &ap) = 0 ;
00125 
00133         virtual void read(DataBlockReader reader, va_list &ap) = 0 ;
00134 
00142         virtual void write1DArray(DataBlockWriter writer , Integer size, va_list &ap) = 0 ;
00143 
00153         virtual void read1DArray(DataBlockReader reader, Integer &size, va_list &ap) = 0 ;
00154 
00163         virtual void write2DArray(DataBlockWriter, Integer xsize, Integer ysize, va_list &) = 0 ;
00164 
00174         virtual void read2DArray(DataBlockReader, Integer &xsize, Integer &ysize, va_list &) = 0 ;
00175 
00181         virtual bool match(sbwSignatureType *other) { return getType() == other->getType(); }
00182 };
00183 
00185 class SignatureType : public SBWHandle<sbwSignatureType>
00186 {
00187 public:
00189         SignatureType() {} ;
00190 
00195         SignatureType(sbwSignatureType *x) : SBWHandle<sbwSignatureType>(x) {}
00196 
00201         DataBlockType getType() { return p->getType() ; }
00202 
00210         std::vector<SignatureElement> *getListContents() { return p->getContents(); }
00211 
00218         SignatureType getArrayInnerType() { return p->getArrayInnerType(); }
00219 
00224         sbwSignatureType *getImpl() { return p ; }
00225 
00232         Integer getArrayDimensions() { return p->getArrayDimensions(); }
00233 
00239         bool match(SignatureType x) { return p->match(x.p); }
00240 };
